<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-right:9.9pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:9.0pt;">Indicate by check
mark whether the registrant (1) has filed all reports required to be filed by
Section 13 or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 during the preceding
12 months (or for such shorter period that the registrant was required to file
such reports), and (2) has been subject to such filing requirements for the
past 90 days.&#160; Yes </font><font lang=EN-US style="font-size:9.0pt;"> &#9745; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:9.0pt;">&#160; No <a name=Check8></a></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;">&#9744;<a name="Check8_bclEnd"></a></font></p>

<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-right:9.9pt;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:9.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-right:9.9pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:9.0pt;">Indicate by check
mark whether the registrant has submitted electronically and posted on its
corporate Web site, if any, every Interactive Data File required to be
submitted and posted pursuant to Rule 405 of Regulation S-T during the
preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that the registrant was
required to submit and post such files).&#160;&#160; Yes </font><font lang=EN-US style="font-size:9.0pt;"> &#9745; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:9.0pt;">&nbsp; No </font><font lang=EN-US style="font-size:9.0pt;"> &#9744; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:9.0pt;">

<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-right:9.9pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:9.0pt;">Indicate by check
mark whether the registrant is a large accelerated filer, an accelerated filer,
a non-accelerated filer, or a smaller reporting company.&#160; See the definitions
of &quot;large accelerated filer,&quot; &quot;accelerated filer&quot; and &quot;smaller
reporting company&quot; in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act.</font></p>

  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

 <td colspan=3 nowrap valign=top width=47% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Foreign exchange translation adjustment</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Comprehensive income attributable to noncontrolling interests</font></p>
  </td>

Statements is an integral part of these statements.</font></i></font></p>

  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="border:none;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(854)</font></p>
  </td>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font style="border:none;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;"><br>
<br>
</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:13.5pt;text-indent:-13.5pt;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1) Includes a net
addition of commercial paper with a maturity of over three months of $0.7
billion in 2016 and $2.6 billion in 2015. The gross amount of commercial paper
with a maturity of over three months issued was $1.0 billion in 2016 and
$2.6&nbsp;billion in 2015, while the gross amount repaid was $0.3 billion in
2016. There were no payments in 2015.</font></i></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">The information in the Notes to Condensed Consolidated Financial
Statements is an integral part of these statements.</font></i></font></p>

Statements is an integral part of these statements.</font></i></font></p>

<p align=center style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:10.0pt;mso-border-shadow:yes;mso-padding-alt:31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt;text-align:center;"><a name="_GoBack_0"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"><br>
</font><font style="display:none;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font style="mso-no-proof:yes;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">7</font></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;">&nbsp;</font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;display:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
</DIV><HR noshade STYLE="page-break-after: always" align="center" width="100%" size=2><a name="page_8"></a><DIV bclPageBorder STYLE="PADDING-TOP: 0.4in; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.4in; WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0.5in; PADDING-LEFT: 0.5in">

<DIV bclHeader>


<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-pagination:widow-orphan no-line-numbers;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:.7pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
<p align=center style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-right:0pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXXON MOBIL
CORPORATION</font></b></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-right:.1in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-right:.1in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOTES TO CONDENSED
CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS</font></b></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0pt;margin-top:0in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0pt;margin-top:0in;text-indent:-.25in;"><a name="XBRL_CS_b363b2e96ae54524abba64b56"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font></b></font><a name="EHW4de3e5a1_ffe3_4b3d_b58f_7c3629"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &nbsp;</font></b></font><a name="EHW4de3e5a1_ffe3_4b3d_b58f_7c3629_bclEnd"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Basis of Financial Statement Preparation</font></b></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0pt;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">These unaudited condensed consolidated
financial statements should be read in the context of the consolidated
financial statements and notes thereto filed with the Securities and Exchange
Commission in the Corporation's 2015 Annual Report on Form 10-K. In the opinion
of the Corporation, the information furnished herein reflects all known
accruals and adjustments necessary for a fair statement of the results for the
periods reported herein. All such adjustments are of a normal recurring nature.
Prior data has been reclassified in certain cases to conform to the current
presentation basis.</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Corporation's exploration and
production activities are accounted for under the &quot;successful
efforts&quot; method.</font></font><a name="XBRL_CS_b363b2e96ae54524abba64b56_bclEnd"></a></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font style="border:none;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;"><br>
<br>
</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><a name="XBRL_TS_1699f04a19924a989be4cf004"></a><a name="XBRL_TS_0db27d2e6b0c488a8ec4cf8fd"></a><font style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Recently Issued Accounting Standards</font></b></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><a name="XBRL_TS_0db27d2e6b0c488a8ec4cf8fd_bclEnd"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">In May 2014, the Financial Accounting
Standards Board issued a new standard, </font><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Revenue from Contracts with Customers</font></i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">.
The standard establishes a single revenue recognition model for all contracts
with customers, eliminates industry specific requirements, and expands
disclosure requirements. The standard is required to be adopted beginning
January 1, 2018. </font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#8220;Sales and Other
Operating Revenue&#8221; on the Consolidated Statement of Income includes sales,
excise and value-added taxes on sales transactions. When the Corporation adopts
the standard, revenue will exclude sales-based taxes collected on behalf of
third parties. This change in reporting will not impact earnings.</font></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;"> &nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Corporation
continues to evaluate other areas of the standard and its effect on the
Corporation&#8217;s financial statements.&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">In February 2016, the
Financial Accounting Standards Board issued a new standard, </font><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Leases</font></i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">. The
standard requires all leases with an initial term greater than one year be
recorded on the balance sheet as an asset and a lease liability. The standard
is required to be adopted beginning January 1, 2019. ExxonMobil is evaluating
the standard and its effect on the Corporation&#8217;s financial statements.</font></font><a name="XBRL_TS_1699f04a19924a989be4cf004_bclEnd"></a></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font style="border:none;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;"><br>
<br>
</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><a name="XBRL_CS_3a9df1fe8b7a4a1ea5785dd07"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font></b></font><a name="EHW1693f290_0231_4051_a80e_54da29"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &nbsp;</font></b></font><a name="EHW1693f290_0231_4051_a80e_54da29_bclEnd"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Litigation and Other Contingencies</font></b></font><a name="XBRL_CS_3a9df1fe8b7a4a1ea5785dd07_bclEnd"></a></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font style="border:none;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-right:0pt;"><a name="XBRL_CS_c49ceb4b457b47dfab3448b5c"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Litigation</font></b></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-right:0pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">A variety of claims
have been made against ExxonMobil and certain of its consolidated subsidiaries
in a number of pending lawsuits. Management has regular litigation reviews,
including updates from corporate and outside counsel, to assess the need for accounting
recognition or disclosure of these contingencies. The Corporation accrues an
undiscounted liability for those contingencies where the incurrence of a loss
is probable and the amount can be reasonably estimated. If a range of amounts
can be reasonably estimated and no amount within the range is a better estimate
than any other amount, then the minimum of the range is accrued. The
Corporation does not record liabilities when the likelihood that the liability
has been incurred is probable but the amount cannot be reasonably estimated or
when the liability is believed to be only reasonably possible or remote. For
contingencies where an unfavorable outcome is reasonably possible and which are
significant, the Corporation discloses the nature of the contingency and, where
feasible, an estimate of the possible loss. For purposes of our contingency
disclosures, &#8220;significant&#8221; includes material matters as well as other matters
which management believes should be disclosed. ExxonMobil will continue to
defend itself vigorously in these matters. Based on a consideration of all
relevant facts and circumstances, the Corporation does not believe the ultimate
outcome of any currently pending lawsuit against ExxonMobil will have a
material adverse effect upon the Corporation's operations, financial condition,
or financial statements taken as a whole.</font></font><a name="XBRL_CS_c49ceb4b457b47dfab3448b5c_bclEnd"></a></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><a name="XBRL_CS_84d6e47c59314f068b5e0cc82"></a></p>
<DIV bclFooter>


<p align=center style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:10.0pt;mso-border-shadow:yes;mso-padding-alt:31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt;text-align:center;"><a name="_GoBack_0"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"><br>
</font><font style="display:none;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font style="mso-no-proof:yes;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">8</font></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;">&nbsp;</font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;display:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
</DIV><HR noshade STYLE="page-break-after: always" align="center" width="100%" size=2><a name="page_9"></a><DIV bclPageBorder STYLE="PADDING-TOP: 0.4in; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.4in; WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0.5in; PADDING-LEFT: 0.5in">

<DIV bclHeader>


<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-pagination:widow-orphan no-line-numbers;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:.7pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Other Contingencies</font></b></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Corporation and
certain of its consolidated subsidiaries were contingently liable at March 31,
2016, for guarantees relating to notes, loans and performance under contracts. Where
guarantees for environmental remediation and other similar matters do not
include a stated cap, the amounts reflect management&#8217;s estimate of the maximum
potential exposure. These guarantees are not reasonably likely to have a
material effect on the Corporation&#8217;s financial condition, changes in financial
condition, revenues or expenses, results of operations, liquidity, capital
expenditures or capital resources.</font></font><a name="XBRL_CS_84d6e47c59314f068b5e0cc82_bclEnd"></a></p>

<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
 <td nowrap width=3% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">

  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="border:none;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=center style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:center;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="border:none;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=11% style="border:none;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;height:12.75pt;padding:0in 3.0pt 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7,486 </font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:9.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=8% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=center style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:center;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
<tr style="height:12.75pt;">
  <td nowrap width=4% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=4% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=4% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=31% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=3% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=1% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=12% style="border:none;height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=3% style="border:none;height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="border:none;height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=11% style="border:none;height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="border:none;height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=center style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:center;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="border:none;height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=11% style="border:none;height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:9.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=8% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=center style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:center;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
<tr style="height:12.75pt;">
  <td nowrap width=4% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td colspan=3 nowrap width=39% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><i><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1) ExxonMobil share</font></i></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=3% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=1% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=12% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=3% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=11% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=center style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:center;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=11% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:9.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=8% style="height:12.75pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=center style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:center;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table></div>



<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font style="border:none;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><a name="XBRL_CS_ac0b32a956d74b78872cb0ae6"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Additionally, the Corporation and its affiliates have numerous
long-term sales and purchase commitments in their various business activities,
all of which are expected to be fulfilled with no adverse consequences material
to the Corporation&#8217;s operations or financial condition. The Corporation's
outstanding unconditional purchase obligations at March 31, 2016, were similar
to those at the prior year-end period. Unconditional purchase obligations as
defined by accounting standards are those long-term commitments that are
noncancelable or cancelable only under certain conditions, and that third
parties have used to secure financing for the facilities that will provide the
contracted goods or services. </font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">The
operations and earnings of the Corporation and its affiliates throughout the
world have been, and may in the future be, affected from time to time in
varying degree by political developments and laws and regulations, such as
forced divestiture of assets; restrictions on production, imports and exports;
price controls; tax increases and retroactive tax claims; expropriation of
property; cancellation of contract rights and environmental regulations. Both
the likelihood of such occurrences and their overall effect upon the
Corporation vary greatly from country to country and are not predictable.&#160; </font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">In accordance with a
nationalization decree issued by Venezuela&#8217;s president in February 2007, by May
1, 2007, a subsidiary of the Venezuelan National Oil Company (PdVSA) assumed
the operatorship of the Cerro Negro Heavy Oil Project. This Project had been
operated and owned by ExxonMobil affiliates holding a 41.67 percent ownership
interest in the Project. The decree also required conversion of the Cerro Negro
Project into a &#8220;mixed enterprise&#8221; and an increase in PdVSA&#8217;s or one of its
affiliate&#8217;s ownership interest in the Project, with the stipulation that if
ExxonMobil refused to accept the terms for the formation of the mixed
enterprise within a specified period of time, the government would &#8220;directly
assume the activities&#8221; carried out by the joint venture. ExxonMobil refused to
accede to the terms proffered by the government, and on June 27, 2007, the
government expropriated ExxonMobil&#8217;s 41.67 percent interest in the Cerro Negro
Project.</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">On September 6, 2007,
affiliates of ExxonMobil filed a Request for Arbitration with the International
Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes (ICSID). The ICSID Tribunal issued
a decision on June 10, 2010, finding that it had jurisdiction to proceed on the
basis of the Netherlands-Venezuela Bilateral Investment Treaty. On October 9,
2014, the ICSID Tribunal issued its final award finding in favor of the
ExxonMobil affiliates and awarding $1.6 billion as of the date of
expropriation, June 27, 2007, and interest from that date at 3.25% compounded
annually until the date of payment in full. The Tribunal also noted that one of
the Cerro Negro Project agreements provides a mechanism to prevent double
recovery between the ICSID award and all or part of an earlier award of $908
million to an ExxonMobil affiliate, Mobil Cerro Negro, Ltd., against PdVSA and
a PdVSA affiliate, PdVSA CN, in an arbitration under the rules of the
International Chamber of Commerce. </font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">On June 12, 2015, the
Tribunal rejected in its entirety Venezuela&#8217;s October 23, 2014, application to
revise the ICSID award. The Tribunal also lifted the associated stay of
enforcement that had been entered upon the filing of the application to revise.
</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Still pending is
Venezuela&#8217;s February 2, 2015, application to ICSID seeking annulment of the
ICSID award. That application alleges that, in issuing the ICSID award, the
Tribunal exceeded its powers, failed to state reasons on which the ICSID award
was based, and departed from a fundamental rule of procedure. A separate stay
of the ICSID award was entered following the filing of the annulment
application. On July 7, 2015, the ICSID Committee considering the annulment
application heard arguments </font></font><!-- Do not modify beyond this point! !--><a name=bcl_connect_next></a></p>
<DIV bclFooter>


<p align=center style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:10.0pt;mso-border-shadow:yes;mso-padding-alt:31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt;text-align:center;"><a name="_GoBack_0"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"><br>
</font><font style="display:none;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font style="mso-no-proof:yes;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">9</font></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;">&nbsp;</font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;display:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
</DIV><HR noshade STYLE="page-break-after: always" align="center" width="100%" size=2><a name="page_10"></a><DIV bclPageBorder STYLE="PADDING-TOP: 0.4in; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.4in; WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0.5in; PADDING-LEFT: 0.5in">

<DIV bclHeader>


<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-pagination:widow-orphan no-line-numbers;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:.7pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><a name=bcl_connect_prev></a><!-- Do not modify before this point! !--><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">from the parties on whether
to lift the stay of the award associated with that application. On July 28,
2015, the Committee issued an order that would lift the stay of enforcement
unless, within 30 days, Venezuela delivered a commitment to pay the award if
the application to annul is denied. On September 17, 2015, the Committee ruled
that Venezuela had complied with the requirement to submit a written commitment
to pay the award and so left the stay of enforcement in place. A hearing on
Venezuela&#8217;s application for annulment was held March 8-9, 2016.</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">The United States
District Court for the Southern District of New York entered judgment on the
ICSID award on October 10, 2014. Motions filed by Venezuela to vacate that
judgment on procedural grounds and to modify the judgment by reducing the rate
of interest to be paid on the ICSID award from the entry of the court&#8217;s judgment,
until the date of payment, were denied on February 13, 2015, and March 4, 2015,
respectively. On March 9, 2015, Venezuela filed a notice of appeal of the
court&#8217;s actions on the two motions. Oral arguments on this appeal were held
before the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit on January 7,
2016.</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">The District Court&#8217;s
judgment on the ICSID award is currently stayed until such time as ICSID&#8217;s stay
of the award entered following Venezuela&#8217;s filing of its application to annul
has been lifted. The net impact of these matters on the Corporation&#8217;s
consolidated financial results cannot be reasonably estimated. Regardless, the
Corporation does not expect the resolution to have a material effect upon the
Corporation&#8217;s operations or financial condition.</font></font><a name="XBRL_CS_ac0b32a956d74b78872cb0ae6_bclEnd"></a></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font style="border:none;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><a name="XBRL_TS_2240fd55e1054a5dad213516b"></a><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">An affiliate of ExxonMobil is one of the Contractors
under a Production Sharing Contract (PSC) with the Nigerian National Petroleum
Corporation (NNPC) covering the Erha block located in the offshore waters of
Nigeria. ExxonMobil's affiliate is the operator of the block and owns a 56.25
percent interest under the PSC. The Contractors are in dispute with NNPC
regarding NNPC's lifting of crude oil in excess of its entitlement under the
terms of the PSC. In accordance with the terms of the PSC, the Contractors
initiated arbitration in Abuja, Nigeria, under the Nigerian Arbitration and
Conciliation Act. On October&nbsp;24, 2011, a three-member arbitral Tribunal
issued an award upholding the Contractors' position in all material respects
and awarding damages to the Contractors jointly in an amount of approximately
$1.8 billion plus $234 million in accrued interest. The Contractors petitioned
a Nigerian federal court for enforcement of the award, and NNPC petitioned the
same court to have the award set aside. On May 22, 2012, the court set aside the
award. The Contractors appealed that judgment to the Court of Appeal, Abuja
Judicial Division. In June 2013, the Contractors filed a lawsuit against NNPC
in the Nigerian federal high court in order to preserve their ability to seek
enforcement of the PSC in the courts if necessary. In October 2014, the Contractors
filed suit in the United States District Court for the Southern District of New
York to enforce, if necessary, the arbitration award against NNPC assets
residing within that jurisdiction. NNPC has moved to dismiss the lawsuit.
Proceedings in the Southern District of New York are currently stayed. At this
time, the net impact of this matter on the Corporation's consolidated financial
results cannot be reasonably estimated. However, regardless of the outcome of
enforcement proceedings, the Corporation does not expect the proceedings to
have a material effect upon the Corporation's operations or financial
condition.&#160; </font></font><a name="XBRL_TS_2240fd55e1054a5dad213516b_bclEnd"></a></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><a name="XBRL_CS_d35276f1f5ee4a74a4a82ebbc"></a><a name="Xbrl_Tag12"></a></p>
<DIV bclFooter>


<p align=center style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:10.0pt;mso-border-shadow:yes;mso-padding-alt:31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt;text-align:center;"><a name="_GoBack_0"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"><br>
</font><font style="display:none;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font style="mso-no-proof:yes;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">10</font></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;">&nbsp;</font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;display:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
</DIV><HR noshade STYLE="page-break-after: always" align="center" width="100%" size=2><a name="page_11"></a><DIV bclPageBorder STYLE="PADDING-TOP: 0.4in; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.4in; WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0.5in; PADDING-LEFT: 0.5in">

<DIV bclHeader>


<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-pagination:widow-orphan no-line-numbers;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:.7pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b></font><a name="Xbrl_Tag12_bclEnd"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">Other Comprehensive
Income Information</font></b></font><a name="XBRL_CS_d35276f1f5ee4a74a4a82ebbc_bclEnd"></a></p>

<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

 <td colspan=6 nowrap width=55% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><b><u><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Comprehensive Income - Before-tax Income/(Expense)</font></u></b></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=1% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:.7in;margin-top:0in;text-indent:-.25in;"><a name="XBRL_TS_f75c0a938dcc4dc4aa5c533bd"></a><a name="XBRL_TS_61bfd702f198479bbfd3e89a1"></a><a name="XBRL_TS_87b12039d5a545f8b86f7430d"></a><a name="XBRL_TS_4db9b84550a6427aa4c41fc19"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">(1) These accumulated other comprehensive income components are
included in the computation of net periodic pension cost. (See Note 6 &#8211; Pension
and Other Postretirement Benefits for additional details.)</font></i></font><a name="XBRL_TS_4db9b84550a6427aa4c41fc19_bclEnd"></a><a name="XBRL_TS_61bfd702f198479bbfd3e89a1_bclEnd"></a><a name="XBRL_TS_87b12039d5a545f8b86f7430d_bclEnd"></a><a name="XBRL_TS_f75c0a938dcc4dc4aa5c533bd_bclEnd"></a></p>

<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align=left><table border=0 cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100%;">
 <tr style="height:12.0pt;">
  <td nowrap valign=bottom width=4% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:8.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:8.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=39% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">

 <td nowrap width=10% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(377)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

 <td colspan=3 nowrap width=45% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Earnings per common share</font><i><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> (dollars)</font></i><i><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:8.0pt;">
  (1)</font></i></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=19% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=9% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 3.0pt 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.43 </font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=2% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:10.0pt;margin-left:31.5pt;margin-right:.7in;margin-top:0in;text-indent:-.25in;"><a name="XBRL_CS_b126e50bb4d94e23b057af7e3"></a><a name="XBRL_CS_87e262a56cd641978fdaaaaa3"></a><a name="Xbrl_Tag7"></a><a name="Xbrl_Tag6"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">(1) The calculation of earnings per common share and earnings per
common share &#8211; assuming dilution are the same in each period shown.</font></i></font><a name="XBRL_CS_87e262a56cd641978fdaaaaa3_bclEnd"></a><a name="XBRL_CS_b126e50bb4d94e23b057af7e3_bclEnd"></a><a name="Xbrl_Tag6_bclEnd"></a><a name="Xbrl_Tag7_bclEnd"></a></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font style="border:none;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><a name="XBRL_CS_37512c2ae213416d89e77963b"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Pension and Other Postretirement Benefits</font></b></font><a name="XBRL_CS_37512c2ae213416d89e77963b_bclEnd"></a></p>

  </td>
 <td nowrap valign=top width=3% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap valign=top width=8% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap valign=top width=2% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap valign=top width=2% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap valign=top width=8% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
<tr style="height:12.0pt;">
  <td nowrap valign=bottom width=4% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:9.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap valign=bottom width=4% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td colspan=3 nowrap width=41% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Other Postretirement Benefits</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=25% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap valign=top width=3% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">

 <td nowrap valign=top width=8% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">

 <td colspan=2 nowrap width=37% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">

 <td nowrap width=25% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">

 <td nowrap width=8% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 3.0pt 0in 0in;">

</font><font style="display:none;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font style="mso-no-proof:yes;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">12</font></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;">&nbsp;</font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;display:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
</DIV><HR noshade STYLE="page-break-after: always" align="center" width="100%" size=2><a name="page_13"></a><DIV bclPageBorder STYLE="PADDING-TOP: 0.4in; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.4in; WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0.5in; PADDING-LEFT: 0.5in">

<DIV bclHeader>


<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-pagination:widow-orphan no-line-numbers;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:.7pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
<p style="border:none;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:11.0pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Financial
Instruments</font></b></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:11.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">The fair value of financial instruments is
determined by reference to observable market data and other valuation
techniques as appropriate. The only category of financial instruments where the
difference between fair value and recorded book value is notable is long-term
debt. The estimated fair value of total long-term debt, excluding capitalized
lease obligations, was $29,061 million at March 31, 2016, and $18,854 million
at December&nbsp;31, 2015, as compared to recorded book values of $28,306 million
at March 31, 2016, and $18,687 million at December&nbsp;31, 2015. The increase
in the estimated fair value and book value of long-term debt reflects the
Corporation&#8217;s issuance of $12.0 billion of long-term debt in the first quarter
of 2016. The $12.0 billion of long-term debt is comprised of $750 million of
floating-rate notes due in 2018, $250 million of floating-rate notes due in
2019, $1,000 million of 1.439% notes due in 2018, $1,250 million of 1.708%
notes due in 2019, $2,500 million of 2.222% notes due in 2021, $1,250 million
of 2.726% notes due in 2023, $2,500 million of 3.043% notes due in 2026 and
$2,500 million of 4.114% notes due in 2046.</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">The fair value of long-term debt by
hierarchy level at March 31, 2016, is: Level&nbsp;1 $28,835 million;
Level&nbsp;2 $164 million; and Level&nbsp;3 $62 million. Level 1 represents
quoted prices in active markets. Level&nbsp;2 includes debt whose fair value is
based upon a publicly available index. Level 3 involves using internal data
augmented by relevant market indicators if available.</font></font><a name="XBRL_CS_bf13b6a7fce9474798a8b20a9_bclEnd"></a></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><a name="XBRL_TS_42b1519dd0774ed5ac0895205"></a></p>
<DIV bclFooter>


<p align=center style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:10.0pt;mso-border-shadow:yes;mso-padding-alt:31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt;text-align:center;"><a name="_GoBack_0"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"><br>
</font><font style="display:none;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font style="mso-no-proof:yes;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">13</font></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;">&nbsp;</font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;display:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
</DIV><HR noshade STYLE="page-break-after: always" align="center" width="100%" size=2><a name="page_14"></a><DIV bclPageBorder STYLE="PADDING-TOP: 0.4in; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.4in; WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0.5in; PADDING-LEFT: 0.5in">

<DIV bclHeader>


<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-pagination:widow-orphan no-line-numbers;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:.7pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br>
</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><a name="XBRL_TS_29502b4eeedc4ac28342b4693"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.</font></b></font><a name=BookmarkName1></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &nbsp;</font></b></font><a name="BookmarkName1_bclEnd"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Accounting for Suspended Exploratory Well Costs</font></b></font><a name="XBRL_TS_29502b4eeedc4ac28342b4693_bclEnd"></a></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font style="border:none;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><a name="XBRL_TS_1ac7f96d0a164ab6b1d4a2810"></a><a name="Xbrl_Tag1"></a><font style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">For the category of exploratory well costs
at year-end 2015 that were suspended more than one year, a total of $74 million
was expensed in the first three months of 2016.</font></font><a name="Xbrl_Tag1_bclEnd"></a><a name="XBRL_TS_1ac7f96d0a164ab6b1d4a2810_bclEnd"></a></p>

<p align=center style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:center;"><a name=mda></a></p>

<tr style="height:12.0pt;">
  <td colspan=3 nowrap width=75% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Earnings per common share - assuming dilution</font><i><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> (dollars)</font></i></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=3% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=8% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 3.0pt 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.43 </font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=3% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=3% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=8% style="height:12.0pt;padding:0in 3.0pt 0in 0in;">
  <p align=right style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:right;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.17 </font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
<tr style="height:9.0pt;">
  <td nowrap width=3% style="height:9.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=43% style="height:9.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=29% style="height:9.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=3% style="height:9.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=8% style="height:9.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=3% style="height:9.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=3% style="height:9.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td nowrap width=8% style="height:9.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;">
  <p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table></div>



<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font style="border:none;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:.5in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">References in this
discussion to corporate earnings mean net income attributable to ExxonMobil
(U.S. GAAP) from the consolidated income statement. Unless otherwise indicated,
references to earnings, Upstream, Downstream, Chemical and Corporate and
Financing segment earnings, and earnings per share are ExxonMobil's share after
excluding amounts attributable to noncontrolling interests.</font></i></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:27.0pt;margin-right:.7in;margin-top:0in;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font style="border:none;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">REVIEW OF FIRST QUARTER 2016 RESULTS </font></b></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">ExxonMobil&#8217;s first
quarter 2016 earnings were $1.8&nbsp;billion, or $0.43&nbsp;per&nbsp;diluted
share, compared with $4.9&nbsp;billion a year earlier. Lower Upstream and
Downstream earnings were partially offset by stronger Chemical results and
lower corporate costs.</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">The organization
continues to respond effectively to challenging industry conditions, capturing
enhancements to operational performance and creating margin uplift despite low
prices. The scale and integrated nature of our cash flow provide competitive
advantage and support consistent strategy execution.</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">New project capacity
additions drove liquids production up 11.5 percent in the quarter, or 261,000
barrels per day. Total Upstream volumes increased to 4.3 million oil-equivalent
barrels per day.</font></font></p>

<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

</table></div>



<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font style="border:none;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Upstream earnings
declined $2,931&nbsp;million from the first quarter of 2015, to a loss of $76
million. Lower liquids and gas realizations decreased earnings by
$2.6&nbsp;billion. Sales mix effects decreased earnings by $100&nbsp;million.
All other items decreased earnings by $250&nbsp;million, including lower gains
on asset sales and less favorable tax items partly offset by lower expenses.</font></font></p>


<DIV bclFooter>


<p align=center style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:10.0pt;mso-border-shadow:yes;mso-padding-alt:31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt;text-align:center;"><a name="_GoBack_0"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"><br>
</font><font style="display:none;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font style="mso-no-proof:yes;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">15</font></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;">&nbsp;</font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;display:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
</DIV><HR noshade STYLE="page-break-after: always" align="center" width="100%" size=2><a name="page_16"></a><DIV bclPageBorder STYLE="PADDING-TOP: 0.4in; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.4in; WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0.5in; PADDING-LEFT: 0.5in">

<DIV bclHeader>


<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-pagination:widow-orphan no-line-numbers;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:.7pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">On an oil-equivalent basis, production increased 1.8&nbsp;percent
from the first quarter of 2015. Liquids production totaled 2.5&nbsp;million
barrels per day, up 261,000&nbsp;barrels per day, while natural gas production
was 10.7&nbsp;billion cubic feet per day, down 1.1&nbsp;billion cubic feet per
day from 2015. Project ramp&#8209;up was partly offset by regulatory
restrictions in the Netherlands, field decline and asset management impacts.</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">The U.S. Upstream
operations recorded a loss of $832&nbsp;million, compared to a loss of
$52&nbsp;million in the first quarter of 2015. Non-U.S. Upstream earnings were
$756&nbsp;million, down $2,151&nbsp;million from the prior year.</font></font></p>

<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font style="border:none;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Listed below are descriptions of ExxonMobil&#8217;s volumes reconciliation
factors which are provided to facilitate understanding of the terms.</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Entitlements - Net
Interest</font></i></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;"> are changes to ExxonMobil&#8217;s share of production volumes caused by
non-operational changes to volume-determining factors. These factors consist of
net interest changes specified in Production Sharing Contracts (PSCs) which
typically occur when cumulative investment returns or production volumes
achieve defined thresholds, changes in equity upon achieving pay-out in partner
investment carry situations, equity redeterminations as specified in venture
agreements, or as a result of the termination or expiry of a concession. Once a
net interest change has occurred, it typically will not be reversed by
subsequent events, such as lower crude oil prices.</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:12.25pt;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Entitlements - Price,
Spend and Other</font></i></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;"> are changes to ExxonMobil&#8217;s share of production volumes resulting
from temporary changes to non-operational volume-determining factors. These
factors include changes in oil and gas prices or spending levels from one
period to another. According to the terms of contractual arrangements or
government royalty regimes, price or spending variability can increase or
decrease royalty burdens and/or volumes attributable to ExxonMobil. For
example, at higher prices, fewer barrels are required for ExxonMobil to recover
its costs. These effects generally vary from period to period with field
spending patterns or market prices for oil and natural gas. Such factors can
also include other temporary changes in net interest as dictated by specific
provisions in production agreements.</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:12.25pt;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Quotas</font></i></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;"> are changes in
ExxonMobil&#8217;s allowable production arising from production constraints imposed
by countries which are members of the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting
Countries (OPEC). Volumes reported in this category would have been readily
producible in the absence of the quota.</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:12.25pt;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Divestments</font></i></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;"> are reductions in
ExxonMobil&#8217;s production arising from commercial arrangements to fully or
partially reduce equity in a field or asset in exchange for financial or other
economic consideration. </font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:12.25pt;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><i><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">Growth and Other</font></i></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;"> factors comprise all
other operational and non-operational factors not covered by the above
definitions that may affect volumes attributable to ExxonMobil. Such factors
include, but are not limited to, production enhancements from project and work
program activities, acquisitions including additions from asset exchanges,
downtime, market demand, natural field decline, and any fiscal or commercial
terms that do not affect entitlements.</font></font></p>

<p style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><font face=Arial,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&nbsp;</font></p>


<DIV bclFooter>


<p align=center style="border:none;margin:0in;margin-bottom:10.0pt;mso-border-shadow:yes;mso-padding-alt:31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt 31.0pt;text-align:center;"><a name="_GoBack_0"></a><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"><br>
</font><font style="display:none;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;"><font style="mso-no-proof:yes;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">16</font></font></font></font><font style="mso-bookmark:_GoBack_0;">&nbsp;</font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;display:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-hide:all;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;"></font></font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="border:none;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
</DIV><HR noshade STYLE="page-break-after: always" align="center" width="100%" size=2><a name="page_17"></a><DIV bclPageBorder STYLE="PADDING-TOP: 0.4in; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0.4in; WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0.5in; PADDING-LEFT: 0.5in">

 </tr>
