<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-31.2
<SEQUENCE>3
<FILENAME>xomexhibit312.htm
<DESCRIPTION>CERTIFICATION (PURSUANT TO SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT RULE 13A-14(A)) BY PRINCIPAL FINANCIAL OFFICER
<TEXT>

<html>

<head>
<meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />




&nbsp;</head>

<body><a name="page_1"></a><DIV bclPageBorder STYLE="PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0.5in; PADDING-LEFT: 0.5in">

<DIV bclHeader>


<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:center 3.25in right 6.5in;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
<p style="margin-bottom:10.0pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align=right style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:right;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">EXHIBIT 31.2</font></b></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Certification by Andrew P. Swiger</font></b></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Pursuant to Securities Exchange Act Rule
13a-</font></b><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">14(a)&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">I,
Andrew P. Swiger, certify that:</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">1.</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">I have reviewed
this quarterly report on Form 10-Q of Exxon Mobil Corporation;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">2.</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Based on my
knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact
or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in
light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">3.</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Based on my
knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included
in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and
for, the periods presented in this report;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">4.</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">The registrant&#8217;s
other certifying officers and I are responsible for establishing and
maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting
(as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant
and have:</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.75in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(a)</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Designed such
disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and
procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material
information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated
subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly
during the period in which this report is being prepared;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:40.5pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.75in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(b)</font><font color=black face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Designed
such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control
over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide
reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the
preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with
generally accepted accounting principles;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:40.5pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.75in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(c)</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Evaluated the
effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and
presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this
report based on such evaluation; and</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:58.5pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.75in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(d)</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Disclosed in
this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial
reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal quarter (the
registrant's fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has
materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the
registrant's internal control over financial reporting; and</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:40.5pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">5.</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">The registrant's
other certifying officers and I have disclosed, based on our most recent
evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant's
auditors and the audit committee of the registrant's board of directors (or
persons performing the equivalent functions):</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.75in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(a)</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">All significant
deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal
control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely
affect the registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report
financial information; and</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:40.5pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.75in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(b)</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Any fraud,
whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a
significant role in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting.</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:40.5pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align=left><table border=0 cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100%;">
 <tr style="height:11.5pt;">
  <td valign=top width=64% style="height:11.5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:31.5pt;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Date: May 4,
  2016&#160; </font></p>
  </td>
 <td valign=top width=36% style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;height:11.5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">/s/&#160;
  ANDREW P. SWIGER</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
<tr style="height:10.1pt;">
  <td valign=top width=64% style="height:10.1pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td valign=top width=36% style="border:none;height:10.1pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Andrew P. Swiger </font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
<tr style="height:10.1pt;">
  <td valign=top width=64% style="height:10.1pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td valign=top width=36% style="height:10.1pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Senior Vice President</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
<tr style="height:10.75pt;">
  <td valign=top width=64% style="height:10.75pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td valign=top width=36% style="height:10.75pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(Principal Financial Officer)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

<p style="margin-bottom:10.0pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:center 3.25in right 6.5in;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-31.3
<SEQUENCE>4
<FILENAME>xomexhibit313.htm
<DESCRIPTION>CERTIFICATION (PURSUANT TO SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT RULE 13A-14(A)) BY PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTING OFFICER
<TEXT>

<html>

<head>
<meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />




&nbsp;</head>

<body><a name="page_1"></a><DIV bclPageBorder STYLE="PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0.5in; PADDING-LEFT: 0.5in">

<DIV bclHeader>


<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:center 3.25in right 6.5in;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
<p style="margin-bottom:10.0pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align=right style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:right;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">EXHIBIT 31.3</font></b></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Certification by David S. Rosenthal</font></b></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><b><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Pursuant to Securities Exchange Act Rule
13a-</font></b><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">14(a)&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">I,
David S. Rosenthal, certify that:</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">1.</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">I have reviewed
this quarterly report on Form 10-Q of Exxon Mobil Corporation;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">2.</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Based on my
knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact
or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in
light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this report; </font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">3.</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Based on my
knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included
in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and
for, the periods presented in this report; </font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">4.</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">The registrant&#8217;s
other certifying officers and I are responsible for establishing and
maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting
(as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant
and have: </font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.75in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(a)</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Designed such
disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and
procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material
information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated
subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly
during the period in which this report is being prepared;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:40.5pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.75in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(b)</font><font color=black face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Designed
such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control
over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide
reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the
preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with
generally accepted accounting principles;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:40.5pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.75in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(c)</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Evaluated the
effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and
presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this
report based on such evaluation; and</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:58.5pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.75in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(d)</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Disclosed in
this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial
reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal quarter (the
registrant's fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has
materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the
registrant's internal control over financial reporting; and </font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:40.5pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.5in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">5.</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">The registrant's
other certifying officers and I have disclosed, based on our most recent
evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant's
auditors and the audit committee of the registrant's board of directors (or
persons performing the equivalent functions):</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.75in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(a)</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">All significant
deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal
control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely
affect the registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report
financial information; and</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:40.5pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.75in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(b)</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Any fraud,
whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a
significant role in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting.</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align=left><table border=0 cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100%;">
 <tr style="height:11.5pt;">
  <td valign=top width=64% style="height:11.5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">

  </td>
 <td valign=top width=36% style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;height:11.5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">/s/&#160;
  DAVID S. ROSENTHAL</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
<tr style="height:10.1pt;">
  <td valign=top width=64% style="height:10.1pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td valign=top width=36% style="border:none;height:10.1pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">David
  S. Rosenthal</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
<tr style="height:.15in;">

  <p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td valign=top width=36% style="height:.15in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">Vice
  President and Controller</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
<tr style="height:.15in;">
  <td valign=top width=64% style="height:.15in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">&nbsp;</font></p>

 <td valign=top width=36% style="height:.15in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">(Principal
  Accounting Officer)</font></p>
  </td>

<TYPE>EX-32.1
<SEQUENCE>5
<FILENAME>xomexhibit321.htm
<DESCRIPTION>SECTION 1350 CERTIFICATION (PURSUANT TO SARBANES-OXLEY SECTION 906) BY CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
<TEXT>

<html>

<head>
<meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />




&nbsp;</head>

<body><a name="page_1"></a><DIV bclPageBorder STYLE="PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0.5in; PADDING-LEFT: 0.5in">

<DIV bclHeader>


<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:center 3.25in right 6.5in;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
<p style="margin-bottom:10.0pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align=right style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:right;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">EXHIBIT 32.1</font></b></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Certification of Periodic
Financial Report</font></b></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Pursuant to 18 U.S.C.
Section 1350</font></b></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">For purposes of 18 U.S.C. Section 1350, as adopted pursuant to
Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, the undersigned, Rex W.
Tillerson, the chief executive officer of Exxon Mobil Corporation (the
&#8220;Company&#8221;), hereby certifies that, to his knowledge:</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(i)</font><font color=black face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">the Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q of the Company for the quarter
ended March 31, 2016, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on
the date hereof (the &#8220;Report&#8221;) fully complies with the requirements of section
13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and </font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(ii)</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">the
information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects,
the financial condition and results of operations of the Company. </font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align=left><table border=0 cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100%;">
 <tr style="height:48.25pt;">
  <td valign=top width=64% style="height:48.25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:31.5pt;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Date: May 4,
  2016</font></p>
  </td>
 <td valign=top width=36% style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;height:48.25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:.5in;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">/s/&#160;
  REX W. TILLERSON</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
<tr style="height:11.65pt;">
  <td valign=top width=64% style="height:11.65pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 <td valign=top width=36% style="border:none;height:11.65pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Rex W. Tillerson</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
<tr style="height:11.65pt;">
  <td valign=top width=64% style="height:11.65pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">
  <p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
 </tr>
</table></div>



<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">A signed original of this written statement required by Section
906 has been provided to Exxon Mobil Corporation and will be retained by Exxon
Mobil Corporation and furnished to the Securities and Exchange Commission or
its staff upon request.</font></p>

<SEQUENCE>6
<FILENAME>xomexhibit322.htm
<DESCRIPTION>SECTION 1350 CERTIFICATION (PURSUANT TO SARBANES-OXLEY SECTION 906) BY PRINCIPAL FINANCIAL OFFICER
<TEXT>

<html>

<head>
<meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />




&nbsp;</head>

<body><a name="page_1"></a><DIV bclPageBorder STYLE="PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0.5in; PADDING-LEFT: 0.5in">

<DIV bclHeader>


<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:center 3.25in right 6.5in;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
<p style="margin-bottom:10.0pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align=right style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:right;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">EXHIBIT 32.2</font></b></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Certification of Periodic
Financial Report</font></b></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Pursuant to 18 U.S.C.
Section 1350</font></b></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">For purposes of 18 U.S.C. Section 1350, as adopted pursuant to
Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, the undersigned, Andrew P.
Swiger, the principal financial officer of Exxon Mobil Corporation (the
&#8220;Company&#8221;), hereby certifies that, to his knowledge: </font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(i)</font><font color=black face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">the Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q of the Company for the quarter
ended March 31, 2016, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on
the date hereof (the &#8220;Report&#8221;) fully complies with the requirements of section
13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and </font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(ii)</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">the
information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects,
the financial condition and results of operations of the Company. </font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&#160;&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align=left><table border=0 cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100%;">
 <tr style="height:48.25pt;">

  <p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
 </tr>
<tr style="height:11.5pt;">

<DESCRIPTION>SECTION 1350 CERTIFICATION (PURSUANT TO SARBANES-OXLEY SECTION 906) BY PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTING OFFICER
<TEXT>

<html>

<head>
<meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />




&nbsp;</head>

<body><a name="page_1"></a><DIV bclPageBorder STYLE="PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; WIDTH: 100%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0.5in; PADDING-LEFT: 0.5in">

<DIV bclHeader>


<p style="margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;tab-stops:center 3.25in right 6.5in;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


</DIV>
<p style="margin-bottom:10.0pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face=Calibri,sans-serif lang=EN-US style="font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align=right style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:right;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">EXHIBIT 32.3</font></b></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Certification of Periodic
Financial Report</font></b></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><b><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">Pursuant to 18 U.S.C.
Section 1350</font></b></p>

<p align=center style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">For purposes of 18 U.S.C. Section 1350, as adopted pursuant to
Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, the undersigned, David S.
Rosenthal, the principal accounting officer of Exxon Mobil Corporation (the
&#8220;Company&#8221;), hereby certifies that, to his knowledge: </font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(i)</font><font color=black face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</font><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">the Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q of the Company for the quarter
ended March 31, 2016, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on
the date hereof (the &#8220;Report&#8221;) fully complies with the requirements of section
13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and </font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;"><font face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">(ii)</font><font face="Times New Roman" lang=EN-US style="font-size:7.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">the
information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects,
the financial condition and results of operations of the Company. </font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:.25in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&#160;&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div align=left><table border=0 cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100%;">
 <tr style="height:48.25pt;">
  <td valign=top width=64% style="height:48.25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;">

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;margin-left:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-top:0in;text-align:justify;"><font color=black face="Times New Roman,serif" lang=EN-US style="font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;">A signed original of this written statement required by Section
906 has been provided to Exxon Mobil Corporation and will be retained by Exxon
Mobil Corporation and furnished to the Securities and Exchange Commission or
its staff upon request.</font></p>

  <xom:AmortizationOfStockBasedAwards id="ID_2" contextRef="FROM_Jan01_2015_TO_Mar31_2015_Entity_0000034088" unitRef="USD" decimals="-6">213000000</xom:AmortizationOfStockBasedAwards>
  <xom:LitigationAndOtherContingenciesTextBlock id="ID_3" contextRef="FROM_Jan01_2016_TO_Mar31_2016_Entity_0000034088">&lt;div&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;margin-left:0pt;' &gt;3&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;' &gt;.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;' &gt;	&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;' &gt;Litigation and Other Contingencies&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p style='line-height:20pt;' /&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;margin-left:0pt;' &gt;Litigation&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:left;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:0pt;' &gt;A variety of claims have been made against ExxonMobil and certain of its consolidated subsidiaries in a number of pending lawsuits. Management has regular litigation reviews, including updates from corporate and outside counsel, to assess the &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;need for accounting recognition or disclosure of these contingencies. The Corporation accrues an undiscounted liability for those contingencies where the incurrence of a loss is probable and the amount can be reasonably estimated. If a range of amounts can&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt; be reasonably estimated and no amount within the range is a better estimate than any other amount, then the minimum of the range is accrued. The Corporation does not record liabilities when the likelihood that the liability has been incurred is probable b&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;ut the amount cannot be reasonably estimated or when the liability is believed to be only reasonably possible or remote. For contingencies where an unfavorable outcome is reasonably possible and which are significant, the Corporation discloses the nature o&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;f the contingency and, where feasible, an estimate of the possible loss. For purposes of our contingency disclosures, &amp;#8220;significant&amp;#8221; includes material matters as well as other matters which management believes should be disclosed. ExxonMobil will continue t&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;o defend itself vigorously in these matters. Based on a consideration of all relevant facts and circumstances, the Corporation does not believe the ultimate outcome of any currently pending lawsuit against ExxonMobil will have a material adverse effect upo&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;n the Corporation&amp;#39;s operations, financial condition, or financial statements taken as a whole.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p style='line-height:20pt;' /&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:bold;margin-left:0pt;' &gt;Other Contingencies&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:left;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:0pt;' &gt;The Corporation and certain of its consolidated subsidiaries were contingently liable at &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;March 31,&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt; &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;2016&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;, for guarantees relating to notes, loans and performance under contracts. &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;Where guarantees for environmental remediation and other similar matters do not include a stated cap, the amounts reflect management&amp;#8217;s estimate of the maximum potential exposure. &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;These guarantees are not reasonably likely to have a material effect on the C&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;orporation&amp;#8217;s financial condition, changes in financial condition, revenues or expenses, results of operations, liquidity, capital expenditures or capital resources.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p style='line-height:20pt;' /&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;table style='border-collapse:collapse;' &gt;&lt;tr style='height:12.75pt;' &gt;&lt;td &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:39pt;text-align:center;border-color:Black;min-width:39pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;tr style='height:12.75pt;' &gt;&lt;td style='width:18.75pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:18.75pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;Other&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:39pt;text-align:center;border-color:Black;min-width:39pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;tr style='height:12.75pt;' &gt;&lt;td style='width:18.75pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:18.75pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:176.25pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:176.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:3.75pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:3.75pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:63.75pt;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:2;text-align:right;border-color:Black;min-width:63.75pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:2;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:2;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:56.25pt;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:2;text-align:right;border-color:Black;min-width:56.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:2;text-align:center;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:2;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:56.25pt;border-top-style:solid;border-top-width:2;text-align:right;border-color:Black;min-width:56.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:39pt;text-align:center;border-color:Black;min-width:39pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;tr style='height:12.75pt;' &gt;&lt;td style='width:18.75pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:18.75pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td colspan='3' rowspan='1' style='width:213.75pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:213.75pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:italic;color:#000000;' &gt;(1) ExxonMobil share&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:3.75pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:3.75pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:63.75pt;text-align:right;border-color:Black;min-width:63.75pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:56.25pt;text-align:right;border-color:Black;min-width:56.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;text-align:center;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:56.25pt;text-align:right;border-color:Black;min-width:56.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:11.25pt;text-align:left;border-color:Black;min-width:11.25pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='width:39pt;text-align:center;border-color:Black;min-width:39pt;' &gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/table&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p style='line-height:20pt;' /&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:0pt;' &gt;Additionally, the Corporation and its affiliates have numerous long-term sales and purchase commitments in their various business activities, all of which are expected to be fulfilled with no adverse consequences material to the Corporation&amp;#8217;s operations &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;or financial condition. The Corporation&amp;#39;s outstanding unconditional purchase obligations at &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;March 31,&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt; &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;2016&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;, were similar to those at the prior year-end period. Unconditional purchase obligations as defined by accounting standards are those long-term c&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;ommitments that are noncancelable or cancelable only under certain conditions, and that third parties have used to secure financing for the facilities that will provide the contracted goods or services. &lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:0pt;color:#000000;' &gt;The operations and earnings of the Corporation and &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;its affiliates throughout the world have been, and may in the future be, affected from time to time in varying degree by political developments and laws and regulations, such as forced divestiture of assets; restrictions on production, imports and exports;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt; price controls; tax increases and retroactive tax claims; expropriation of property; cancellation of contract rights and environmental regulations. Both the likelihood of such occurrences and their overall effect upon the Corporation vary greatly from cou&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;ntry to country and are not predictable.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;  &lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:0pt;' &gt;In accordance with a nationalization decree issued by Venezuela&amp;#8217;s president in February 2007, by May 1, 2007&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;,&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt; a subsidiary of the Venezuelan National Oil Company (PdVSA) assumed the operatorship of the Cerro Negr&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;o Heavy Oil Project. This Project had been operated and owned by ExxonMobil affiliates holding a 41.67 percent ownership interest in the Project. The decree also required conversion of the Cerro Negro Project into a &amp;#8220;mixed enterprise&amp;#8221; and an increase in Pd&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;VSA&amp;#8217;s or one of its affiliate&amp;#8217;s ownership interest in the Project, with the stipulation that if ExxonMobil refused to accept the terms for the formation of the mixed enterprise within a specified period of time, the government would &amp;#8220;directly assume the ac&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;tivities&amp;#8221; carried out by the joint venture. ExxonMobil refused to accede to the terms proffered by the government, and on June 27, 2007, the government expropriated ExxonMobil&amp;#8217;s 41.67 percent interest in the Cerro Negro Proj&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;ect.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:0pt;' &gt;On September 6, 2007, affi&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;liates of ExxonMobil filed a Request for Arbitration with the International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes (ICSI&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;D)&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;. The ICSID Tribunal issued a decision on June 10, 2010, finding that it had jurisdiction to proceed on the basis of the Netherl&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;ands-Venezuela Bilateral Investment Treaty. &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;On October 9, 2014, the ICSID Tribunal issued its final award finding in favor of the ExxonMobil affiliates and awarding $1.6 billion as of the date of expropriation, &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;J&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;une 27, 2007, and interest from that date at&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt; 3.25% compounded annually until the date of payment in full. The Tribunal also noted that one of the Cerro Negro Project agreements provides a mechanism to prevent &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;double recovery between the ICSI&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;D award and all or part of an earlier award of $908 million&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt; to an ExxonMobil affiliate, Mobil Cerro Negro, Ltd&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;, against PdVSA and a PdVSA affiliate, PdVSA CN, in an arbitration under the rules of the International Chamber of Commerce. &lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:0pt;' &gt;On June 12, 2015, the Tribunal rejected in its entirety Venezuela&amp;#8217;s October 2&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;3, 2014, application to revise the ICSID award. The Tribunal also lifted the associated stay of enforcement that had been entered upon the filing of the application to revise. &lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:0pt;' &gt;Still pending is Venezuela&amp;#8217;s February 2, 2015, application to ICSID seeking an&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;nulment of the ICSID award. That application alleges that, in issuing the ICSID award, the Tribunal exceeded its powers, failed to state reasons on which the ICSID award was based, and departed from a fundamental rule of procedure. A separate stay of the I&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;CSID award was entered following the filing of the annulment application. On July 7, 2015, the ICSID Committee considering the annulment application heard arguments from the parties on whether to lift the stay of the award associated with that application.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt; On July 28, 2015, the Committee issued an order that would lift the stay of enforcement unless, within 30 days, Venezuela delivered a commitment to pay the award if the application to annul is denied. On September 17, 2015, the Committee ruled that Venezu&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;ela had complied with the requirement to submit a written commitment to pay the award and so left the stay of enforcement in place. &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;A hearing on Venezuela&amp;#8217;s application for annulment was held March 8-9, 2016.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:0pt;' &gt;The United States District Court &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;for the Southern District of New York entered judgment on the ICSID award on October 10, 2014. Motions filed by Venezuela to vacate that judgment on procedural grounds and to modify the judgment by reducing the rate of interest to be paid on the ICSID awar&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;d from the entry of the court&amp;#8217;s judgment, until the date of payment, were denied on February 13, 2015, and March 4, 2015, respectively. On March 9, 2015, Venezuela filed a notice of appeal of the court&amp;#8217;s actions on the two motions. &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;Oral arguments on this a&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;ppeal were held before the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit on January 7, 2016.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:0pt;' &gt;The District Court&amp;#8217;s judgment on the ICSID award is currently stayed until such time as ICSID&amp;#8217;s stay of the award entered following Venezuela&amp;#8217;s filing of &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;its application to annul has been lifted. The net impact of these matters on the Corporation&amp;#8217;s consolidated financial results cannot be reasonably estimated. Regardless, the Corporation does not expect the resolution to have a material effect upon the Corp&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;' &gt;oration&amp;#8217;s operations or financial condition.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;p style='line-height:20pt;' /&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;p style='text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:12pt;' &gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:0pt;color:#000000;' &gt;An affiliate of ExxonMobil is one of the Contractors under a Production Sharing Contract (PSC) with the Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) covering the &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;Erha&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt; block located in the offshore waters of Nigeria. ExxonMobil&amp;#39;s affiliate is the oper&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;ator of the block and owns a 56.25 percent interest under the PSC. The Contractors are in dispute with NNPC regarding NNPC&amp;#39;s lifting of crude oil in excess of its entitlement under the terms of the PSC. In accordance with the terms of the PSC, the Contract&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;ors initiated arbitration in Abuja, Nigeria, under the Nigerian Arbitration and Conciliation Act. On October&amp;#160;24, 2011, a three-member arbitral Tribunal issued an award upholding the Contractors&amp;#39; position in all material respects and awarding damages to the&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt; Contractors jointly in an amount of approximately $1.8 billion plus $234 million in accrued interest. The Contractors petitioned a Nigerian federal court for enforcement of the award, and NNPC petitioned the same court to have the award set aside. On May &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;22, 2012, the court set aside &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;the award. The Contractors &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;appealed that judgment&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt; to the Court of Appeal, Abuja Judicial Division&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;. &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;In June 2013&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;,&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt; the Contractors filed a lawsuit against NNPC in the Ni&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;gerian federal high court in order to preserve their ability to seek enforcement of the &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;PSC&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt; in the courts if necessary. &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;In October 2014&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;,&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt; the Contractors filed suit in the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York to enforce&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;, if nec&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;essary, &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;the arbitration award against NNPC assets residing within that jurisdiction. &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;NNPC has moved to dismiss the lawsuit. Proceedings in the Southern District of New York are currently stayed. &lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;At this time, the net impact of this matter on the Corporatio&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;n&amp;#39;s consolidated financial results cannot be reasonably estimated. However, regardless of the outcome of enforcement proceedings, the Corporation does not expect the proceedings to have a material effect upon the Corporation&amp;#39;s operations or financial condi&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;tion.&lt;/font&gt;&lt;font style='font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;color:#000000;' &gt;  &lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</xom:LitigationAndOtherContingenciesTextBlock>
